name: hoiwahub-33
description: A lightweight 3D browser mini-game inspired by your Hoiwa Hub horror prompt: - Setting: Hung To Road, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong - Gameplay: fixed-position defense across 5 Days (easy -> hard), each Day ends with a Boss - Aim: mouse/trackpad with widened horizontal arc plus vertical up/down pointer control - Weapon: hand-held Jesus crucifix firing one cross ammo per `S` press - Holy Water: auto-unlock at score `1000`; press `F` for area attack - Holy Water milestone: every additional 1000 score gives +1 Holy Water charge
